message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal for both of us
I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money.
Come on, Bob, don't be greedy. This is a better deal than my first offer.
Alice, this is a good deal. Even with inflation, I'm taking a smaller cut than before. Let's wrap this up.
Inflation is eating away at your share, Bob. Take this deal before it's too late.
